body: : Spines grow on the sahuagin's scales. Any creature that successfully grapples with it, is grappled by it, or hits it with an unarmed strike or natural weapon takes 1d4 points of piercing damage. The sahuagin also gains the benefits of the Improved Grapple feat.
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Sahuagin/New Rules/Sahuagin Spells/Gift of the Deep/Spined
name: Spined
